A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite its faults - for which is has a few - this film is an excellent addition to the saga.  A little unexpected at times is good for the film and the fans.  The humour can be a little too obvious at times but still good.\nThe biggest issue us that they could probably have cut half an hour without negatively affecting the story or film. However\, I think the last 45-60 minutes is some of the best of all star wars films.
